title: MILESTONES AND MEMORIES: Share photos from the big moments of 2019
text:
Did you or someone in your family mark a major milestone in 2019? Share your memorable moments with us!

Email pictures from milestone events such as birthday parties, newborn babies, graduations, weddings, reunions, anniversaries, vacations -- anything that stood out for you and your family during the past year.

Email photos to readerpix@wickedlocal.com. Be sure to identify anyone in the photo, including name, age (if relevant) and hometown. Watch for an online photo gallery on your Wicked Local website.

Here’s to more great memories and milestones in 2020!
